steps: Step 1: Read tools/interlinear/output/pro-issues.txt to identify flagged verses
Step 2: For each flagged verse, read the corresponding line in tools/interlinear/output/pro.tsv
Step 3: Identify the issue type: consecutive duplicate glosses, separable verb particles, unknown words in brackets, or death idiom errors
Step 4: Apply the correct fix based on German grammar rules (see ai-review-instructions.md)
Step 5: Edit the TSV file with corrected glosses
Step 6: After all corrections, run: python3 scripts/consolidate_interlinear.py
Step 7: Verify corrections by checking the updated TSV lines
